p: Benzophenones are a class of compounds that have a common phenol-carbonyl-phenol skeleton and exhibit significant structural diversity. Plant species belonging to the family Clusiaceae are characterized by the presence of benzophenones [ 18]. Various polyisoprenylated benzopheones have been reported from G. mangostana, G. indica, and G. gummigutta [ 19]. Garcinol ( 11) ( Figure 2, Table 1) was isolated and identified from the fruits and leaves of Indian gamboge [ 3, 13].
